column4: Hey, I'm having wireless problems with my macboo pro. ANyone have a mcbook pro?
I did that. Still having issues after a couple restarts
I'm afraid your best friend is google, I don't have a mac, feel free to keep asking, or search the channel list, may be a macubuntu channel
Thanks so much. Google hates me after about 200 pages of searching on one topic. lol
lol, you'll make up, if not, try the haxor version :p or perhaps the brazil version, apparently if you search 100 pages, google send you chocolate :p
It keeps bringing me the same pages after a while
or at least the same info
well, if you keep waiting, eventually at some point, a chocolate bar will come your way, I like to think of that as 'google's pushing influence' of real life :p
ok, so you're timing out, overheating perhaps?
Heat is fine. I keep an eye on it, and not timing out, cause it works great if I plug ethernet in and redo it a second later
it happens on routers too, sometimes you get them so you have to reset after so much downloading, the bthomehub is the worse for that, reseting weekly...
and the speed is fine till it dead stops
if it is atheros (I think madwifi is) then you are better off using the ubuntu-extras, they have it inbuild
I mean the restricted ones sorry
but you don't have to use cvs, that could be the problem, it might just be unstable
